introduce.en: EOS-Huobipool is committed to providing one-stop financial and technology services and solutions to every members in EOS community and form close partnerships in the blockchain industry. EOS-Huobipool is a business unit of Huobi Group, Huobi brand is widely known in the global blockchain industry with excellent reputation.
introduce.zh: EOS-Huobipool旨在为EOS社区的每位成员提供一站式金融科技服务和解决方案，并在区块链领域构建紧密的合作伙伴关系。EOS-Huobipool隶属于火币集团，火币品牌在全球区块链领域拥有优异的知名度和口碑。
